```{r setup}
library(httr)
library(jsonlite)
```

## Construct Call to the API

```{r creds}
key <- "xTzumeA9jmquHHfYgCwtXU68ICDD0wTo"
days <- "7"
socialmedia <- "twitter"
baseurl <- "https://api.nytimes.com/svc/mostpopular/v2/shared/"
apicall <- paste(baseurl,days,"/",socialmedia,".json?api-key=",key,sep="")
apicall

```

## Pull Data

```{r pull}
get_mosPop <- GET(apicall)
response <- content(get_mosPop, "text", encoding = "UTF-8")
res_json <- fromJSON(response, flatten = TRUE)
results <- as.data.frame(res_json['results'])

results
```
